channel.title: Delta/No Lag/150+
channel.description:
Delta/No Lag/184 players!
It starts to lag a bit when you hit 190 but you can put up with it. It starts to lag heaps when it hits 250.
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/x0smcz.jpg[/img]

item.title: Delta/No Lag/150+
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

So I leave this topic asking for the OP to explain what his point was in this thread, I come back to 2 (almost) full pages of flame and spam… carried on by the OP and a few others (though after reading it again it doesn’t suprise me who the others were :rolleyes:)

[quote=“Primadude, post:58, topic:390829”][quote author=Primadude link=topic=486774.msg3567484#msg3567484 date=1302761828]

What is the point of this topic?

Way to wreck the quote chain we had going

Why would I carry on a fucking stupid chain that achieves nothing but post count and idiocy?
[/quote][/quote]I think the point they tried to make is that you posted the exact same thing, which is essentially part of the chain anyway. But I understand not wanting to do the ‘quote’ part

[quote=“Primadude, post:58, topic:390829”][quote author=Blood-Killers link=topic=486774.msg3567653#msg3567653 date=1302790060]
Anyway it doesn’t matter i’m going to be the bigger and the more mature man and not reply.
[/quote]

If you were the ‘bigger and more mature man’, you wouldn’t have posted a retaliation reply in the first place.[/quote]I think it isn’t just Blood-Killer in this case, there were a few others as well. In fact BK had more reason to post here than they did, they purely did it to continue the flame/spam, whereas it’s his thread. I find it sad how some members can say they get picked on, and then they do it to others as well?

Deathschaos, why didn’t you clean the topic?

Read full topic

For example:

qqo5g8.png765×449

This was using less than 512Mb RAM and a 1.3GHz processor.

Oh, and I didn’t really read the thread carefully, but did you ever tell us what kind of specs the computer that hosted the server had?

item.title: Delta/No Lag/150+
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:38, topic:390829”]Not to put you down or anything but:
184 players is still shit when you compare it to the fact that RuneScape can handle 2000 players with barely any lag atall.[/quote]

Not that I care what you think but the fact that your comparing one of the most popular MMORPG that easily makes well over $400,000 per month to a poorly coded (compared to Runescape) private server is just sad. If your going to put me down, compare me with another private server that does shit on myne, that way it’s much more equal.
[/quote]

Fine, ile compare it to hyperion then which is also known to be able to hold 2000 players. By the way, what is the point of this thread exactly? i’ve seen plently of deltascape servers hold this amount of people…

Read full topic

item.title: Delta/No Lag/150+

ranger squad:

You’re a wannabe because you seem to feel you have some kind of authority on this forum, when in reality you are unwanted.

You have no valid points, what your saying is complete crap! Your just saying it. I don’t care if i’m unwanted its the internet! Who cares, I now none of you in real life and most likely never will. You keep saying the same stuff and obviously don’t have an idea what your talking about.

Anyway it doesn’t matter i’m going to be the bigger and the more mature man and not reply. Your the one who stated this not me. I have never done anything to you and I don’t know why you come out of nowhere and be a smartass.

item.title: Delta/No Lag/150+
item.dc:creator: @Blood-Killers Blood-Killers
item.description:
@Blood-Killers wrote:

Umadbro? Learn to quote.

I highly doubt you are, maybe to your friends but you and me are strangers, I highly doubt you would even consider being a smartass to a stranger because you would most likely get your head kicked in. Please elaborate, how am I an wannabe? I may be unwanted but I don’t care honestly. I have friends in real life, I don’t make friends over the internet.

Don’t go off trying to pick my mistakes, I was just saying that your telling me to fix my grammatical errors but yet you don’t do it yourself. That’s all my point.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta/No Lag/150+
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“Blood-Killers, post:40, topic:390829”][quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=486774.msg3567572#msg3567572 date=1302781116]
My Delta is better.

endofstory

inb4lock
[/quote]

I highly doubt it, I’m releasing this soon and trust me it’s almost perfect. Few bugs here and here that I know of but they should be fixed anytime soon. Perfect combat, stability, perfect economy, all dupes patched, 100% duel arena, minigames almost 100%, all ingame npc 508 models (attacking styles etc), skills not quite 100% but getting there.

Have worked on it for so long. To be honest I would surprised and extremely impressed if yours was infact better than myne.

Not to put you down or anything but:
184 players is still shit when you compare it to the fact that RuneScape can handle 2000 players with barely any lag atall.

Not that I care what you think but the fact that your comparing one of the most popular MMORPG that easily makes well over $400,000 per month to a poorly coded (compared to Runescape) private server is just sad. If your going to put me down, compare me with another private server that does shit on myne, that way it’s much more equal. [/quote]

And I am a smart arse in real life, get the fuck out of this forum you unwanted wannabe.

[quote=“Blood-Killers, post:43, topic:390829”]Why don’t you use grammar?

Your an idiot, I’m not even going to answer what you said, you just made the biggest douche of yourself…(space should go here)Well done. Your clearly a wannabe troll(comma should go here) or else you wouldn’t have said that.[/quote]
:rolleyes:

Read full topic

Fuck I hate the moparscape community, honestly the majority are alright but others are just retard kids. Honestly the kids here act all tuff and try to act funny. How many would actually be a smart ass like some do in real life? Zero!

item.description:

Lmao ranger.
@Blood-Killers, Proof there bots? and not just a sM?
brb 10

Ok i’d have to do it all again, but i’ll get a picture of the allgofree bot if you want and it saying 184 players. Or do you want proof that it doesn’t lag?
[/quote]
Even if it was allgofree, they still connect through one IP, if you had different connections from different hostnames + IP addresses you would lag.[/quote]

Good point. I guess your right.

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:39, topic:390829”]My Delta is better.

endofstory

inb4lock[/quote]

I highly doubt it, I’m releasing this soon and trust me it’s almost perfect. Few bugs here and here that I know of but they should be fixed anytime soon. Perfect combat, stability, perfect economy, all dupes patched, 100% duel arena, minigames almost 100%, all ingame npc 508 models (attacking styles etc), skills not quite 100% but getting there.

Have worked on it for so long. To be honest I would surprised and extremely impressed if yours was infact better than myne.

[quote=“Fire capez, post:38, topic:390829”]Not to put you down or anything but:
184 players is still shit when you compare it to the fact that RuneScape can handle 2000 players with barely any lag atall.[/quote]

Not that I care what you think but the fact that your comparing one of the most popular MMORPG that easily makes well over $400,000 per month to a poorly coded (compared to Runescape) private server is just sad. If your going to put me down, compare me with another private server that does shit on myne, that way it’s much more equal.
